statements: DELETE FROM charging_patterns WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND energy_consumed >= 50;
DELETE FROM charging_patterns WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND energy_consumed > 50;
DELETE FROM charging_patterns WHERE grid_impact_rating < 3 AND start_time < '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM grid_impact WHERE impact_level = 'High' AND event_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM grid_impact WHERE grid_event_id = 500 AND impact_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM charging_station WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM charging_station WHERE location = 'San Francisco';
DELETE FROM grid_impact WHERE station_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM grid_impact WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01' AND impact_level = 'high'
